deformablemesh.gui

Class ControlFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • deformablemesh.gui.ControlFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FrameListener, ReadyObserver

    public class ControlFrame
extends Object
implements ReadyObserver, FrameListener
    GUI commands -> Delegate to segmentation controller. GUI based actions should be funneled through this class for enabling/disabling the UI. User: msmith Date: 7/16/13 Time: 10:35 AM
